casebody.data:
State
v.
Jesus Martinez 25P17-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 19, 2017 Daniel M. Blau, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Robert Hale, Jr., Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Martinez, Jesus. Lauren M. Clemmons, Special Deputy Attorney General, Joseph L. Hyde, Assistant Attorney General, R. Andrew Murray, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 19th of January 2017 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

*101"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of January 2017."
